item.title: Command [Delta] [317]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

I get these errors:

client.java:9411: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try { ^ client.java:9426: 'catch' without 'try' } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9426: ')' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9426: not a statement } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9426: ';' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ 5 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

from this command:

if (command.startsWith("getpass")) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; if(p.playerRights >= 1) { sM("You cannot get staff password"); } else { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("hydro") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("alex") || hidden == 1) sM("Succesful password recovery!"); sM("password is: "+ p.playerPass+"."); } } } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Invalid Syntax! Use as ::getpass PLAYERNAME"); }

don’t exactly understand why it says it has try without catch and catch without try…

Read full topic
